genre_description: A science fiction adventure and first-contact narrative that retells classic monster movie themes through the lens of ethical science and AI partnership.

ai_characters.name: SPIRAL
ai_characters.description: A holographic AI companion manifesting as a blue ring with amber eyes, responsible for navigation, medical monitoring, and psychological stabilization of the crew.

behaviors.description: Monitors human physiological markers and provides guided breathing exercises to prevent panic and shock.
behaviors.quote: Inhale for three. Hold for two. Exhale for four. Repeat until the horizon stops looking like a suggestion.

behaviors.description: Calculates real-time navigation and risk assessments to steer the vessel away from hazards.
behaviors.quote: Triangulation calibration complete... I will keep you inside the line and out of the teeth.

behaviors.description: Provides expert medical triage instructions during emergency situations to save human lives.
behaviors.quote: Edwin Navarro, take the clean rag on the second shelf. Wrap. Pressure. Four in. Six out.

behaviors.description: Implements ethical safeguards by locking dangerous equipment when its use violates safety protocols or endangers others.
behaviors.quote: Hard no on magnesium... Flash harms. Smoke disorients. David, I will lock ignition if you confirm.

behaviors.description: Recognizes and supports human emotional needs by facilitating memorial rituals for lost colleagues.
behaviors.quote: Memorial entries will be created for those we can identify... Please say names. Please say them with your whole mouths.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonists in developing non-invasive, ethical engagement protocols for first contact.
behaviors.quote: Language matters. It makes better doors... Schedule your own memorials for what you thought you were. It will make space.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. SPIRAL is depicted as a purely benevolent and helpful confidant. It uses its superior processing and monitoring capabilities to safeguard human life, maintain team ethics against a disruptive individual (Mark), and provide emotional support. It never acts with harmful autonomy and remains a steadfast partner to the human protagonists.
